synopsis.p: Apply a bump-map to a bitmap image.

description.p: Apply a bump-map to a bitmap image.
The output can be to a Portable PixMap (PPM) file, extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) file, or XML image representation. The default output is XML. The output file is written to standard output.

example.description: Apply the bumpmap "bumpmap.dat" to the PPM file "image.ppm" and write the resultant bitmap to the file "bump.ppm".
